name: .MINT File Extension
summary: Learn about .MINT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A MINT file is an installation package for Linux Mint, a modern, stylish Linux distribution. It contains a software program and instructions that mintinstall, a Mint installer, uses to install the program. Only Linux Mint users can install the program a MINT file contains.

content: Mintinstall is a software manager that allows Linux Mint users to easily search for and install applications. The installation packages that mintinstall uses to install applications are saved as MINT files.

Notably, using mintinstall allows users to install software without having to perform any manual setup or configuration. Instead, mintinstall uses instructions stored in the software's MINT package to automatically perform any needed configuration during the installation process.

instructions: You can use mintinstall to install the software package a MINT file contains. For more detailed instructions, refer to mintinstall's documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
